title: Civil penalty
context: ยง325-102 Civil penalty. Any person or institution who wilfully violates any provision of this part shall be fined not less than $1,000 nor more than $10,000 for each violation plus reasonable court costs and attorney&rsquo;s fees as determined by the court, which penalty and costs shall be paid to the person or persons whose records were released. [L 1986, c 161, pt of ยง1; am L 1989, c 377, ยง2; am L 1992, c 162, ยง2]
